title: Run full test suite and fix any failures
description: Execute uv run pytest across the entire codebase. Investigate and fix any test failures found. Ensure all tests pass cleanly before marking complete.

title: Run frontend typecheck and fix errors
description: Run npm run typecheck in src/frontend/ and fix any TypeScript errors found. Ensure clean typecheck pass.

title: Audit codebase for TODO/FIXME/HACK comments
description: Search the codebase for TODO, FIXME, and HACK comments. Categorize them by urgency and area. Create backlog items for any that represent real work to be done.

title: Review and clean up stale worker context files
description: Check .cmux/worker-contexts/ for context files belonging to workers that no longer exist. Remove stale ones to keep the directory clean.
